agent_purpose: Security architecture and compliance roadmap for GDPR, DPDP, SOC-2, ISO-27001
description: Designs security architecture, compliance roadmap, threat models, and privacy-preserving techniques for VEMAR.AI

result.security_architecture: Implement encryption at rest using AES-256 and TLS 1.3 for data in transit. Adopt a zero-trust architecture ensuring authentication and authorization at every layer. Use OAuth 2.0 and JWT for API authentication. Implement API rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure availability.

threat_model.mitigation: Implement AI-driven detection mechanisms and continuous model training to identify deepfakes.
Enforce strict rate limiting and authentication procedures, monitor for abnormal access patterns.
Use robust data validation protocols and anomaly detection systems to identify and isolate tainted data.
Deploy differential privacy measures and monitor queries to detect and prevent model extraction attempts.

result.data_retention_policy: Store biometric data and user videos for a maximum of 6 months unless further retention is explicitly consented by users. Keep fraud logs for up to 1 year for compliance and forensic purposes.
